mapper.select: SELECT so.outbound_no AS outbound_no, so.customer_name AS customer_name, so.representative_nm AS representative_nm, so.order_dt AS order_dt, so.outbound_dt AS outbound_dt FROM sales_outbound so WHERE so.outbound_no IN ( SELECT DISTINCT outbound_no FROM soutbound_detail WHERE outbound_status = '대기' )
SELECT outbound_no, item_name AS prod_name, standard, qty AS outbound_quantity, outbound_status, remarks AS memo FROM soutbound_detail WHERE outbound_no = #{outboundNo}
